hero.headline: Product Owner & AI / Backend Engineer
summary: Product and strategy focus with hands-on backend and applied AI delivery.
Experience leading cross-functional teams and high-impact digital products.
Specialized in data-driven platforms, automation, and intelligent systems.
Participated in startup acceleration programs: Wayra (Telefónica) and La Nave (Community of Madrid).

highlights.title: Highlights
items: End-to-end leadership of digital products focused on business and user outcomes.
AI solution design and scalable architectures oriented to results.
Technical team management and stakeholder alignment.
Hybrid background across Product Ownership, Project Management, and Backend/AI engineering.
Delivered education and project-management products with personalization and automation.

story.title: Professional narrative
body: I combine product vision with technical execution to turn ideas into real solutions.
I move comfortably between business, data, and technology to connect strategy with results.

callouts.title: How I work
items: Impact first: focus on metrics, user value, and business goals.
Sustainable pace: iterative delivery with early feedback.
Open collaboration: clear communication with teams and stakeholders.

cv.headline: Product Owner & AI / Backend Engineer with experience leading AI-driven digital products.
cv.summary: Enthusiastic electronic engineer with a strong drive to contribute to team success through rigorous work, attention to detail, and excellent organizational skills. Passionate about Artificial Intelligence, software development, and the intersection of business and technology. Motivated to learn, grow, and create real impact through innovative solutions. Experience in startup acceleration programs such as Wayra (Telefónica) and La Nave (Community of Madrid).

highlights: Built an internal check-in application using computer vision algorithms.
Implemented neural network models for visual analysis.
Tech stack: TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib.
End-to-end development following Scrum methodology.
Built a platform to personalize math learning in schools.
Designed and implemented an IRT algorithm that dynamically adjusts questions based on student profiles.
Tech stack: Django (Python), SQL (MariaDB), React (JavaScript), Shiny (R).
Used management tools: GitHub, Jira, Trello.
End-to-end project management under Scrum.
Built an application to assess tech talent across different languages and frameworks.
Product management and coordination of technical teams.
Stack: Django (Python), SQL (MariaDB), React.
Startup leadership training in acceleration programs: La Nave (Community of Madrid) and Wayra (Telefónica).
Full lifecycle leadership of digital products (BoostWorker, BookTheCity, NinjaTalent).
Requirements, roadmap, and release management aligned with business and user needs.
Product Backlog prioritization with agile methods (Scrum / Kanban).
Cross-functional coordination with engineering, design, QA, marketing, sales, and stakeholders.
Constant bridge between business and technology.

projects.name: MathKeyboard
projects.description: Mathematical keyboard to simplify writing mathematical expressions.
highlights: Hardware design with SolidEdge.
Programming on Arduino.

projects.name: Educational AI Applications
projects.description: Prediction and recommendation algorithms for math exercises.
highlights: Extensive use of TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib.

projects.name: YPM — Your Project Manager
projects.description: AI-powered project management platform to accelerate execution and planning.
highlights: Import requirements from PDF.
Automatic generation of user stories and tasks.
Estimation and assignment based on RAG and historical data.
Sprint organization.
Stack: Django, React, LangChain, Qdrant.

projects.name: Viajame
projects.description: AI travel planning and organization app.
highlights: Automatic generation of travel plans.
Import preferences via WhatsApp.
Using n8n, Google APIs, and WhatsApp.
